verse.name: v1
verse.lines: These are the days of Elijah newline declaring the word of the Lord newline And these are the days of Your servant, Moses, newline Righteousness being restored.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And Though these are days of great trials, newline of famine and darkness and sword newline Still, we are the voice in the desert crying, newline "Prepare ye the way of the Lord!"

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Behold He comes, riding on the cloud newline Shining like the sun, at the trumpet call newline So lift your voice, it's the year of jubilee, newline And out of Zion's hill, salvation comes.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And these are the daus pf Ezekiel, newline The dry bones becoming as flesh. newline And these are the days of Your servant, David, newline Rebuilding the temple of praise.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And these are the days of the harvest, newline The fields are as white in the world. newline And we are the laborers in Your vineyard, newline declaring the word of the Lord!
